_meta.description: F5-TTS Voice Cloning - Generate speech in a specific voice
_meta.use_case: Clone a voice from reference audio (replaces ElevenLabs voice cloning)

agent_notes.REFERENCE_AUDIO: Path to reference voice audio (3-10 seconds, clear speech, no background noise)
agent_notes.REFERENCE_TEXT: Exact transcript of what is said in reference audio (must match precisely)
agent_notes.TEXT: New text to be spoken in the cloned voice
quality_tips: Reference must have clear speech, no music/noise
REFERENCE_TEXT must exactly match what's spoken
Similar length/style to reference works best

3._comment: Clone voice from reference and generate new speech

5._comment: Output duration for video sync: frames = duration_seconds * fps
